entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of light snow. Temperature rising to minus 16 by morning. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of light snow overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature rising to minus 16 by morning. Wind chill minus 29 this evening and minus 20 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Thursday 12 January 2023
